channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- MicroLogix 1400
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- MicroLogix 1400

item.title: CVE-2022-2179|2024-09-16T16:52:42.154Z -- rockwell%20automation -- micrologix%201400
item.description: The X-Frame-Options header in Rockwell Automation MicroLogix 1100/1400 Versions 21.007 and prior is not configured in the HTTP response, which could allow clickjacking attacks.
